title: Whatever happened to Baby Jane?
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sibling rivalry
description: Bette Davis plays Jane Hudson, an aging alcoholic whose vauderville career as child-star "Baby Jane" has faded to obscurity. Her sister Blanche (Jane Crawford) lived in Jane's shadow as a girl but enjoyed a successful adult career as a glamourous film star until an "accident" left her wheelchair-bound. The aging sisters live alone in a gloomy Hollywood mansion, with Jane becoming increasingly eccentric and keeping Blanche a virtual prisoner. After a series of horrific incidents, the obsessive relationship between the two draws to a sinister conclusion. Based on the novel by Henry Farrell.
